programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Beach Chair Murder
programme.desc: The body of Marion Caspary is found in a beach chair by the sea. Near the scene of the crime, Commissioner Sievers comes across Piet Pinter, an elderly confused gentleman. What connection does he have to the murder?

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: When photographer Marlene's son Jason faces a life-altering skateboarding accident, their journey to healing takes unexpected turns. As they travel from Berlin to Switzerland, Jason slowly convinces his mother that life takes detours.

programme.title: Jeanny: The Fifth Girl
programme.desc: In a picturesque tiny town near Vienna, young girls have been vanishing without a trace for years. Jeanny has just fallen in love with a mysterious man. But when she notices signs of a dark side in him, she becomes suspicious. Will she be the next victim?

programme.title: In The Heart Of The World
programme.desc: In a poor Brazilian neighbourhood, its many inhabitants struggle to make ends meet. Everyone yearns for a happier future where life isn’t only about unforgiving survival – petty crime, big crime, anything that pays becomes a pathway of hope.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: The Final Passenger
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet investigates the death of a German businessman and his cab driver in a Turkish seaside town. What initially looks like a deadly robbery turns out to be the precision work of a killer. But which of the two victims was the victim?

programme.title: The Apple of My Eye
programme.desc: Elise is beautiful, funny, and blind. Theo is a seducer but a loser. They love music. But when they meet in the elevator, it's hate at first sight.

programme.title: Midnight At The Paradise
programme.desc: Over the course of one evening, three couples are pulled into a collision course of sexual chemistry, delusion, forgiveness and hope as they explore what love, death, desire and the magic of the movies mean to them.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: The Black Minutes
programme.desc: Vicente Rangel, a musician turned detective, embarks on a police case to catch a murderer of girls in a corrupt oil town on the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: Empty Nets
programme.desc: Amir loves Narges and Narges loves Amir. But their hopes and dreams for a life together collide head on with the web of tradition, corruption, and social hierarchy that continues to rule over the lives of a new generation in Iran.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Beach Chair Murder
programme.desc: The body of Marion Caspary is found in a beach chair by the sea. Near the scene of the crime, Commissioner Sievers comes across Piet Pinter, an elderly confused gentleman. What connection does he have to the murder?

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Deadly Desire
programme.desc: When an Istanbul real estate manager is burned alive in his car, Inspector Mehmet Özakin has to dig into a maze of corruption and fraud to try and piece together the deadly puzzle - and almost becomes a victim himself.

programme.title: I Have Electric Dreams
programme.desc: 16-year-old Eva is experiencing her sexual awakening and is desperate to leave the house she shares with her mother and younger sister and move in with her estranged father, a troubled artist who paints, sculpts, writes poetry and drinks too much.

programme.title: 3 Meters Above The Sky
programme.desc: An upper middle class good girl falls for a bad boy on the wrong side of the tracks. It is a first love that is at once passionate and tempestuous. Released in Spain in 2010, it was a major box office hit.

programme.title: The Pursuit
programme.desc: When a young man decides to climb a staircase in the middle of an enchanted forest, he is confronted with unanticipated chaos. Stuck on a seemingly never-ending journey, will he ever make it out of the woods?

programme.desc: As part of his tribe’s rite of passage, a young hunter has to prove his worth by hunting down a great beast. However, amidst navigating the hunt and the rituals of his tribe, he finds himself increasingly troubled by what he has done.

programme.title: The Apple of My Eye
programme.desc: Elise is beautiful, funny, and blind. Theo is a seducer but a loser. They love music. But when they meet in the elevator, it's hate at first sight.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: Empty Nets
programme.desc: Amir loves Narges and Narges loves Amir. But their hopes and dreams for a life together collide head on with the web of tradition, corruption, and social hierarchy that continues to rule over the lives of a new generation in Iran.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Deadly Desire
programme.desc: When an Istanbul real estate manager is burned alive in his car, Inspector Mehmet Özakin has to dig into a maze of corruption and fraud to try and piece together the deadly puzzle - and almost becomes a victim himself.

programme.title: Hunting Season
programme.desc: Enersto, a hunting guide in Patagonia, is left to take care of his teenage son he hasn’t seen for years. An intense father-son relationship is played out amidst the hostility of nature.

programme.title: I Have Electric Dreams
programme.desc: 16-year-old Eva is experiencing her sexual awakening and is desperate to leave the house she shares with her mother and younger sister and move in with her estranged father, a troubled artist who paints, sculpts, writes poetry and drinks too much.

programme.title: Carte Blanche
programme.desc: An uplifting tale of Kacper, a charismatic high school history teacher who hides his progressing blindness from everyone around him to fulfil his educational duties. His methods are unorthodox, sometimes hilarious, and devilishly effective.

programme.title: 3 Meters Above The Sky
programme.desc: An upper middle class good girl falls for a bad boy on the wrong side of the tracks. It is a first love that is at once passionate and tempestuous. Released in Spain in 2010, it was a major box office hit.

programme.title: Baltic Files I - The Body On The Beach
programme.desc: After being transferred to the German-Danish border, Chief Inspector Svenja is tasked with a case involving a body on a beach. With her new colleague Antione, she investigates a case which involves a liquor dealer and a tragedy that goes back decades.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Deadly Love
programme.desc: Ina Behrendsen is devastated when she discovers the beaten, dead body of her lover, Leo Fischer on the beach. The murder weapon? Ina’s own car jack. Yet as Sievers delves deeper into the case, the suspicions begins to shift to a wild group of youngsters.

programme.title: Top Dogs
programme.desc: A dramedy about two estranged brothers from Normandy. Antoine is happily married with two kids and a successful boat driver, whereas Christian is a globe-trotting hustler. When Antoine becomes involved in sleazy activities, Christian comes to his rescue.

programme.title: The Key Witness
programme.desc: BKA bodyguard Jan Schäfer must protect Fiona Weibel, a key witness for the International Tribunal of the Law of the Sea. With Weiber having insider knowledge of a Swiss shipping company's illicit activities, a game of cat and mouse over her life begins.

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: What's for Dinner, Mom?
programme.desc: Sisters Tae and Yo return to their childhood home and discover a box of recipes and letters from their late Japanese mother. As Tae uncovers her mother’s hidden struggles, she journeys to Taiwan to retrace her past through memory and food.
